categoryMongoId: Category must be a valid Mongo ID.
maxBudgetInt: Max budget must be an integer.
minBudgetCustom: Min budget must be less than max budget.
searchKeywordsArray: Search keywords must be an array with at least one element.
searchKeywordsString: Each search keyword must be a string.
subcategoryArray: Subcategory must be an array with at least one element.
subcategoryMongoId: Each subcategory must be a valid Mongo ID.
tagsArray: Tags must be an array with at least one element.
tagsMongoId: Each tag must be a valid Mongo ID.
producerIdMongoId: Producer ID must be a valid Mongo ID.
categoryOptional: Subcategory required if category is provided.
maxBudgetOptional: Min budget required and must be less than max budget.
minBudgetOptional: Max budget required and must be greater than min budget.
searchKeywordsOptionalArray: Search keywords must be an array with at least one element.
searchKeywordsOptionalString: Each search keyword must be a string.
subcategoryOptional: Category required if subcategory is provided.
subcategoryOptionalMongoId: Each subcategory must be a valid Mongo ID.
tagsOptionalArray: Tags must be an array with at least one element.
tagsOptionalMongoId: Each tag must be a valid Mongo ID.
tagsOptionalString: Each tag must be a valid Mongo ID.
userOptionalMongoId: User ID must be a valid Mongo ID.
